sense.def:
To encourage someone to do something
pomeni nekomu reči, da bi po našem mnenju moral nekaj storiti ali tisto še naprej delati.

seg.quote: Her husband encouraged her to get a car.
Many people sent messages of encouragement.

sense.def:
To encourage a particular activity
pomeni živahno podpirati neko dejavnost.

seg.quote: Group meetings in the factory were always encouraged.

sense.def:
Če nekaj
encourages an attitude or a kind of behaviour
, poskrbi, da z večjo verjetnostjo pride do nekega odnosa ali vedênja.

seg.quote: This encouraged the growth of Marxism.
